The following notices describe how code from 3rd parties was re-used.

3rd party notices follow.  Separator provided for convenience.

================================================================================


Original theme from:
https://github.com/mojombo/mojombo.github.io

Site theme forked from:
https://github.com/joearms/joearms.github.com

Categories and tags implementation from:
https://github.com/minddust/minddust.github.io
http://www.minddust.com/post/tags-and-categories-on-github-pages/
